name: Pink Onion
author: Amin M.
description: I never write a yelp review, but I had to for this place. Hands down the best pizzas, pastas, bruschetta (honestly anything on the menu) that I have ever had. I have tried both the specialty pizzas with the cayenne infused olive oil on top, the pesto-pistachio pasta, and the truffle bruschetta so far, they were all incredible!Definitely recommend.
